attributes.action: Deal with e-petitions within 1 month rather than dragging them on for years
attributes.additional_details:
Why do I see so many e-petitions that end at the back end of 2012?

These petitions are the people of this country telling you what issues are affecting us at the moment, and waiting a year before you even consider these issues is not acceptable.

I want to see all relevant e-petitions dealt with within 3 months as any longeer m,akes a mockery of the whole process.

I am willing to allow a maximum of 3 months to collect signatures, please do the same!!
